pageContext.description: Dimensions: L 113mm; We 80mm; Wbt 38.3mm; Max T 12.9mm; Tbt 2mm; T e bev 4.5mm; D e bev 5mm; Wt 430.9 gms,Typology: slight asymmetry in side section; slight twist down length of body. second edge bevel weak but still perceptible,Manufacture: linear wory ridge on both sides, almost whole of one side - probably not casting flash; ? indirect effect of post-cast working and differential corrosion,Condition: intact part of edge not very sharp. Chip broken out of butt
pageContext.surface: rather craggy surface mostly, some smooth areas
pageContext.collection: Loaned to Great Orme Mines Ltd, on display 1991.
pageContext.site: wales,gwynedd,llandudno,deganwy,found by metal-detectionist 75mm below surface 26th jan. 1991 on 70m od contour. finder: mr. ron sartus
